channel.title: Adding a teleport in the "task tab" pl0x
channel.description: I'd like to add teleports into the task tab, beside the quest tab. I'm not entirely sure how to go about this, as I'm using a PI and trying to learn and understand how to use it. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2zp4a3a.png[/img] I don't want to necessarily be spoon fed, because I'm trying to get better. Any input would be great.
